revised_title: Diamagnetic Anisotropy in Organic Molecules: A Study of Crystal Structures and Magnetic Susceptibilities
tldr: This article investigates the diamagnetic anisotropy of various organic molecules, focusing on their crystal structures and magnetic susceptibilities. The study includes long-chain compounds, layer-type compounds, and aliphatic compounds with different electronic groupings. The findings provide insights into the relationship between molecular shape, electronic configurations, and magnetic properties of organic molecules.
